SEARCH

Interface IDoctorMedicalRecordAccess

public interface IDoctorMedicalRecordAccess
The `IMedicalRecordManagement` interface defines operations for managing patient medical records, allowing authorized users (like doctors) to view and update records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    updateMedicalRecord(Appointment appointment, String diagnosis, String treatment)
    Allows authorized users to update the medical record of a patient associated with a specific appointment.
    MedicalRecord
    viewMedicalRecord(Appointment appointment)
    Allows authorized users to view the medical record of a patient associated with a specific appointment.

  • Method Details

    • viewMedicalRecord

      MedicalRecord viewMedicalRecord(Appointment appointment)
      Allows authorized users to view the medical record of a patient associated with a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment whose patient's medical record needs to be viewed.
      Returns:
      The `MedicalRecord` of the patient, or `null` if access is denied.

    • updateMedicalRecord

      boolean updateMedicalRecord(Appointment appointment, String diagnosis, String treatment)
      Allows authorized users to update the medical record of a patient associated with a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment whose patient's medical record needs to be updated.
      diagnosis - The new diagnosis to add to the medical record.
      treatment - The new treatment to add to the medical record.
      Returns:
      `true` if the medical record was updated successfully, `false` otherwise.
